long_description: With soft, supple leather and adjustable rip-and-stick straps, the Merrell Terrapin Sandals are a must-have for summertime by the beach. Full-grain leather uppers have Lycra(R) neoprene lining for padded comfort; treated with Aegis(R) antimicrobial treatment to help prevent odors from developing. EVA midsoles with Air Cushion(R) shock-absorbent heel pockets offer all-day cushioning comfort. Injection-molded nylon arch shanks add stability and support on uneven terrain. Rip-and-stick straps let you fine-tune the fit. Durable rubber outsoles deliver reliable traction on all types of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: With soft, supple leather and adjustable rip-and-stick straps, the Merrell Terrapin Sandals are a must-have for summertime by the beach.
